metadata.name: Shoulder Rehab Phase 1
metadata.focus: Re-align Supraspinatus collagen. Fix aching back via glute/hamstring strength.

daily_routine.name: ATLAS Morning Protocol
daily_routine.description: Perform upon waking (7 days/week). Addresses all injury sites systematically.

exercises.name: Short Foot Exercise
cues: Dome the arch without curling toes

exercises.name: Eccentric Calf Raises
cues: Lower on one foot slowly (4 sec)
Go below step level for stretch
Alfredson protocol: 3x15 per side for tendon adaptation

exercises.name: Dead Bug
cues: Keep lower back pressed to floor

exercises.name: Clamshells (Glute Med Activation)
cues: Lift top knee keeping feet together
RIGHT SIDE PRIORITY - do extra set if time

exercises.name: Doorframe External Rotation
cues: Press back of hand into frame at 40-70% MVC

exercises.name: Towel Crush
cues: Rolled towel between elbow and ribs

exercises.name: Thoracic Extensions (Foam Roller)
cues: Extend over roller, don't arch lower back

strength_a.name: Strength A (Legs & Back)
strength_a.goal: Fix aching back by strengthening glutes/hamstrings and mobilizing hips.

exercises.name: Single-leg Balance on Pillow
exercises.notes: Per leg. Eyes open -> Eyes closed progression. NO REST - continuous switching.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.notes: Heels elevated if ankle mobility limited. Week 1-4: 8-12 reps. Push knees OUT over toes.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.notes: Dumbbell or barbell. Hinge at hips, soft knee bend. Feel hamstrings stretch. Don't round lower back.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.notes: Hip snap, not squat. Provides some Zone 4 HR work. Hinge pattern reinforcement.

exercises.name: Split Squats (Bodyweight/Light DB)
exercises.notes: Per leg. Opens tight hip flexors dynamically. Drive front knee OUT.

exercises.name: Bird-Dog
exercises.notes: Per side. Brace core. Do not let lower back arch. McGill Big 3 component.

exercises.name: McGill Curl-Up
exercises.notes: Hands under lower back. Brace. Lift head/shoulders only. 8-10 second holds. McGill Big 3 component.

exercises.name: Banded Ankle Dorsiflexion Mobilization
exercises.notes: RIGHT ANKLE ONLY. Band above ankle, drive knee forward over toes. 3s hold at end range. Priority exercise for 4cm deficit.

exercises.name: Single-Leg RDL (Right Side Priority)
exercises.notes: RIGHT leg standing. Light weight. Focus on hip hinge + ankle stability. Keep standing knee slightly pushed out. Addresses compensation patterns.

strength_b.name: Strength B (Shoulder Rehab)
strength_b.goal: Re-align Supraspinatus collagen. NO PULL-UPS/CHIN-UPS YET.

exercises.name: Floor Press (Dumbbells)
exercises.notes: Floor stops elbows from going too deep and straining the capsule.

exercises.name: Chest-Supported Row (Incline Bench)
exercises.notes: Supports lower back. Focus on squeezing shoulder blades DOWN and back.

exercises.name: Side-Lying Wiper (Eccentric Focus)
exercises.notes: THE HEALER. Use light weight (1-2kg). Lift up with help, lower down SLOWLY (4 seconds) on your own.

exercises.name: Band Pull-Aparts
exercises.notes: Palms up. Don't shrug shoulders.

exercises.name: Face Pulls (Band/Cable)
exercises.notes: External rotate at top. Targets rear delts and external rotators. Light weight. Evidence: adds back pulling volume.

strength_c.name: Strength C (Full Body + Neck)
strength_c.goal: Functional carrying capacity and Blueprint neck standards.

exercises.name: Sumo Deadlift (DB/KB)
exercises.notes: Wide stance, toes out 45°. More upright torso than conventional. Drive knees out, chest up. Heavy compound - progress weight weekly.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat (Heavy)
exercises.notes: Heavier than Monday, lower reps. Push knees OUT over toes.

exercises.name: KB Clean & Press
exercises.notes: Power from hips, press from shoulder. Week 1-4: Substitute Landmine Press if shoulder not ready.

exercises.name: Suitcase Carries
exercises.notes: Heavy DB in one hand. Walk perfectly straight. Anti-lateral flexion.

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
exercises.notes: Start light, focus on each position. Week 1-4: Half get-up only (to elbow).

exercises.name: Neck Harness (Flexion/Extension)
exercises.notes: Bryan Johnson Standard. Start very light. Control the tempo.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.notes: McGill Big 3 component. Elbow under shoulder. Straight line from head to feet.

exercises.name: Inverted Rows (TRX/Bar)
exercises.notes: Horizontal pulling. Feet on floor, body at angle. Squeeze shoulder blades. Addresses back pulling volume gap.

exercises.name: Lateral Band Walks
exercises.notes: Band above knees. Stay low in quarter squat. 10 steps each direction. Burn in glute med = good. Fixes knee valgus pattern.

zone2_cardio.name: Zone 2 Cardio (The Engine)
zone2_cardio.goal: Increase mitochondrial density and clear lactate.

exercises.name: Zone 2 Session
exercises.notes: Heart Rate 60-70% Max (Conversation pace). Can talk in full sentences.

active_mobility.name: Active Mobility (The Anti-Aging Flow)
active_mobility.goal: HUSTL Style / Back Decompression. Thoracic mobility and hip flexor opening.

exercises.name: Light Zone 2 Jog
exercises.notes: Easy warmup pace.

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.notes: 10 reps per side.

exercises.name: Deep Squat Hold
exercises.notes: Accumulate 2 minutes total. Can break into sets.

exercises.name: Thoracic Rotations
exercises.notes: Open the desk-posture hunch.

exercises.name: Couch Stretch
exercises.notes: 2 mins per side. Aggressive hip flexor opening.

zone2_extended.name: Zone 2 Extended (Aerobic Build)
zone2_extended.goal: Build aerobic base. No HIIT until GATE 1 cleared.
hiit_clearance_requirements: Pain ≤2/10 for 2+ weeks on shoulder AND ankle

exercises.name: Zone 2 Extended Session
exercises.notes: Ruck walk (10-15kg) preferred. Brisk walk or hike acceptable. HR 109-127 bpm. Conversation pace. No jogging until passing walk test pain-free.

ruck_walk.name: Ruck Walk (Preferred)
ruck_walk.notes: 10-15kg backpack. Flat to moderate terrain. Great for core/posture.

brisk_incline_walk.name: Brisk Incline Walk
brisk_incline_walk.notes: Treadmill at 10-15% incline OR hilly route. Zero ankle impact.

family_hike.name: Family Hike
family_hike.notes: Mixed terrain. Keep HR in Zone 2. Combines exercise with family time.

exercises.name: NSDR (Non-Sleep Deep Rest)
exercises.notes: Yoga Nidra or similar protocol.

exercises.name: Family Walk
exercises.notes: Light movement with family.

red_day_override.description: When Traffic Light is RED, replace scheduled workout with this recovery protocol.

exercises.name: Zone 2 Walk
exercises.notes: Light walking only. No intensity.

exercises.name: NSDR (Non-Sleep Deep Rest)
exercises.notes: Essential for recovery.

injury_context.mechanism: Double Crush Injury - Chronic (repetitive overhead loading) + Acute (soccer fall)
